channel.title: Cloudshell on Cino
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudshell on Cino

item.title: TIL #3 - AWS CloudShell in your own vpc
item.description: Until recently, I was completely unaware of AWS CloudShell, and I’m glad I finally decided to give it a try. CloudShell provides a shell environment right in your browser, and to my surprise, you can start an instance within your own VPC!
